com.avanza.astrix.beans.core

Class AstrixBeanSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avanza.astrix.beans.core.AstrixBeanSettings

  • public final class AstrixBeanSettings
extends Object
    Author:
    Elias Lindholm (elilin)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AstrixBeanSettings.BeanSetting<T> 
      static class  AstrixBeanSettings.BooleanBeanSetting 
      static class  AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting 
      static class  AstrixBeanSettings.LongBeanSetting 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AstrixBeanSettings.BooleanBeanSetting AVAILABLE
      Its possible to set service-beans in unavailable state, in which it throws a ServiceUnavailableException on each invocation.
      static AstrixBeanSettings.BooleanBeanSetting BEAN_METRICS_ENABLED
      Determines whether statistics should be collected for each invocation on the associated Astrix bean.
      static AstrixBeanSettings.BooleanBeanSetting FAULT_TOLERANCE_ENABLED
      Determines whether fault tolerance should be applied for invocations on the associated Astrix bean.
      static AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting INITIAL_CORE_SIZE
      Defines the default "coreSize" when thread isolation is used to protect invocations to the associated bean, i.e. the number of threads in the bulkhead associated with a synchronous service invocation.
      static AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting INITIAL_MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS
      Defines the default "maxConcurrentRequests" when semaphore isolation is used to protect invocations to the associated bean, i.e. the maximum number of concurrent requests before the fault-tolerance layer starts rejecting invocations (by throwing ServiceUnavailableException)
      static AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting INITIAL_QUEUE_SIZE_REJECTION_THRESHOLD
      Defines the default "queueSizeRejectionThreshold" for the queue when thread isolation is used to protect invocations to the associated bean, i.e. number of pending service invocations allowed in the queue to a thread-pool (bulk-head) before starting to throw ServiceUnavailableException.
      static AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting INITIAL_TIMEOUT
      When fault tolerance is enabled this setting defines the initial timeout used for invocations on the associated bean.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • FAULT_TOLERANCE_ENABLED

        public static final AstrixBeanSettings.BooleanBeanSetting FAULT_TOLERANCE_ENABLED
        Determines whether fault tolerance should be applied for invocations on the associated Astrix bean.

      • BEAN_METRICS_ENABLED

        public static final AstrixBeanSettings.BooleanBeanSetting BEAN_METRICS_ENABLED
        Determines whether statistics should be collected for each invocation on the associated Astrix bean.

      • INITIAL_TIMEOUT

        public static final AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting INITIAL_TIMEOUT
        When fault tolerance is enabled this setting defines the initial timeout used for invocations on the associated bean. This setting is named "initial" to reflect the fact that updates to this bean settings at runtime will not have any effect. All runtime changes to the timeout for the associated Astrix bean should be done using the archaius configuration.

      • INITIAL_MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS

        public static final AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting INITIAL_MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS
        Defines the default "maxConcurrentRequests" when semaphore isolation is used to protect invocations to the associated bean, i.e. the maximum number of concurrent requests before the fault-tolerance layer starts rejecting invocations (by throwing ServiceUnavailableException)

      • INITIAL_CORE_SIZE

        public static final AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting INITIAL_CORE_SIZE
        Defines the default "coreSize" when thread isolation is used to protect invocations to the associated bean, i.e. the number of threads in the bulkhead associated with a synchronous service invocation.

      • INITIAL_QUEUE_SIZE_REJECTION_THRESHOLD

        public static final AstrixBeanSettings.IntBeanSetting INITIAL_QUEUE_SIZE_REJECTION_THRESHOLD
        Defines the default "queueSizeRejectionThreshold" for the queue when thread isolation is used to protect invocations to the associated bean, i.e. number of pending service invocations allowed in the queue to a thread-pool (bulk-head) before starting to throw ServiceUnavailableException.

      • AVAILABLE

        public static final AstrixBeanSettings.BooleanBeanSetting AVAILABLE
        Its possible to set service-beans in unavailable state, in which it throws a ServiceUnavailableException on each invocation.
